pages.text: $(d)Pitcher Plants$() generate water.$(br2)You can harvest this water by using a Bucket or any other fluid-storage item on it.$(br2)It will also periodically fill adjacent fluid tanks, and can be extracted from via fluid pipes.
pages.title: Pitcher Plant

pages.text: Pitcher Plants can be found in biomes with the biome tag $(3)c:is_wet/overworld$().
